description: All values associated with a claim are stored in the Claim External Value record.  The REL_CAUSE_CD table holds codes indicating whether the claim is related to employment or an accident.

columns.name: RECORD_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the claim record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this contact. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this contact.

columns.name: REL_CAUSE_CD
columns.description: This item holds the codes to identify if the claim is related to employment or to an accident.
